fields.name: Gay (passive):
fields.value: You are gay. Because of this, if someone targets you with an ability, they will have a hidden extra vote on them during the next day phase for committing hate crimes.

fields.name: Gender (passive):
fields.value: At the beginning of the game everyone is assigned a gender, which they know (For the purpose of game mechanics, this is one of Male, Female, or Nonbinary, if someone's role implies a gender, then they are that gender. [for example: AFAB Vigilante (post 63) Will always start female] At least 3 people will share your gender, not including you.)

fields.name: Kiss:
fields.value: Choose a player. If they are the same gender as you, kiss them, giving both of you a permanent +0.2x Defense Power boost (you may only do this once per person)
